name: Prophetic Visionary
description: Your oracular abilities give you a glimpse into the future.
benefit: Once per day, you can enter a deep trance to receive a vision of the future. The trance lasts for 10 minutes, during which time you can take no other actions. If you are interrupted, you must begin again. When you come out of the trance, you know whether a particular action in the immediate future will bring good or bad results, as an augury spell with a 70% chance of success.
mythicDescription: Your precognitive powers aid you further.
mythicBenefit: You can use Prophetic Visionary’s augury ability at will, spending 10 minutes in a deep trance each time. Your chance of a successful augury increases by 1% per tier. A successful augury made by using this feat also grants you the benefits of guidance, but the bonus is equal to your tier and is an insight bonus instead of a competence bonus.
description_zh: 你的先知能力使你得以一瞥未来。
benefit_zh: 每天1次，你能够进入一种入神状态并且一观未来的景象。入神持续10分钟，在这段时间里你不能进行任何其他的行动。如果你被打断了，你必须重新开始。当你入神结束后，你可以得知接下来的某个特定行为带来的结果是好是坏，这如同一个‘占卜术’般有70%的成功率。
